author: Taylor Pittman
description:
Ti West first imagined Pearl in his A24 film of the same name as a sympathetic yet brutal female antagonist battling against isolation and madness on her parents’ farm. Now, she’s been transcribed from screen to page in Pearl by Tim Waggoner. Waggoner is no stranger to TV and film adaptations with several notable series […]

The post REVIEW: Pearl by Tim Waggoner appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Pearl by Tim Waggoner
